main event: Cpl Harold N. Blair observed a flying saucer type object fly over post while on guard duty at Killeen Base.
interesting points: The object had a green fluorescent appearance with two red flames protruding from the rear., It was approximately 10 feet wide and flew at an estimated speed of 700-800 mph., Cpl Blair reported hearing a sound similar to a model airplane engine., The object was observed for about 2 to 3 seconds and was flying at approximately 1000 feet altitude., Blair had no prior experience as an aircraft observer or in astronomy.
sighted object: flying saucer type object with green fluorescent front and two red flames at the rear
witness description: Cpl Harold N. Blair, Military Police
